subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Infielder Hanley Ramirez and reliever Randy Choate went to Los Angeles in the deal, while Miami received pitcher Nathan Eovaldi and the minor leaguer Scott McGough.
snippet: Infielder Hanley Ramirez and reliever Randy Choate went to Los Angeles in the deal, while Miami received pitcher Nathan Eovaldi and the minor leaguer Scott McGough.
